SELECT COUNT(0) FROM tbl_device WHERE tbl_device.device_code IN ( SELECT device_code FROM tbl_access_device TD WHERE TD.authority_code = #{ahrCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
AND tbl_device.area_id IN (#{areaid,jdbcType = INTEGER})
AND tbl_device.device_name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{devicename,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%'))

SELECT tbl_device.device_code,tbl_device.device_name, tbl_device.status_code FROM tbl_device WHERE tbl_device.device_code IN ( SELECT device_code FROM tbl_access_device TD WHERE TD.authority_code = #{ahrCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
AND tbl_device.area_id IN (#{areaid,jdbcType = INTEGER})
AND tbl_device.device_name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{devicename,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%'))

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM tbl_device LEFT JOIN tbl_access_device ON tbl_device.device_code = tbl_access_device.device_code AND tbl_access_device.device_code IN ( SELECT device_code FROM tbl_access_device TD, tbl_authority TA WHERE TD.authority_code = TA.authority_code AND TA.authority_code = #{ahrcode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1=1
AND tbl_device.area_id IN (#{areaid,jdbcType = INTEGER})
AND tbl_device.device_name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{devicename,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%'))

SELECT DISTINCT(tbl_device.device_code), tbl_device.device_name, CASE WHEN tbl_access_device.device_code IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END AS device_checked FROM tbl_device LEFT JOIN tbl_access_device ON tbl_device.device_code = tbl_access_device.device_code AND tbl_access_device.device_code IN ( SELECT device_code FROM tbl_access_device TD, tbl_authority TA WHERE TD.authority_code = TA.authority_code AND TA.authority_code = #{ahrcode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1=1
AND tbl_device.area_id IN (#{areaid,jdbcType = INTEGER})
AND tbl_device.device_name LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{devicename,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%'))

SELECT DISTINCT(tbl_monitor.thing_code), tbl_monitor.thing_name, CASE WHEN tbl_access_monitor.thing_code IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END AS monitor_checked FROM tbl_monitor LEFT JOIN tbl_access_monitor ON tbl_monitor.thing_code = tbl_access_monitor.thing_code AND tbl_access_monitor.thing_code IN ( SELECT thing_code FROM tbl_access_monitor TAM, tbl_authority TA WHERE TAM.authority_code = TA.authority_code AND TA.authority_code = #{ahrcode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )

SELECT TA.authority_code, TA.authority_name FROM tbl_authority TA WHERE 1 = 1
AND TA.authority_code = #{ahrcode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
SELECT TU.user_code, TU.user_name FROM tbl_user_ahr TUA, tbl_user TU WHERE TUA.user_code = TU.user_code AND TUA.authority_code = #{ahrcode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT TM.module_id, TM.module_remark, 1 AS level_flag, CASE WHEN TAD.authority_code IS NULL THEN 'false' WHEN TAD.check_status = 'checked' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS module_checked FROM tbl_module TM LEFT JOIN tbl_authority_detail TAD ON TM.module_id = TAD.control_id AND TAD.level_id = 1 AND TAD.authority_code = #{ahrcode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT TP.page_id, TP.page_remark, 2 AS level_flag, CASE WHEN TAD.authority_code IS NULL THEN 'false' WHEN TAD.check_status = 'checked' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS page_checked FROM tbl_page TP INNER JOIN tbl_module TM ON TP.module_id = TM.module_id LEFT JOIN tbl_authority_detail TAD ON TP.page_id = TAD.control_id AND TAD.level_id = 2 AND TAD.authority_code = #{ahrcode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} WHERE 1=1 AND TM.module_id = #{moduleid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}

SELECT TC.control_id, TC.control_remark, 3 AS level_flag, CASE WHEN TAD.authority_code IS NULL THEN 'false' WHEN TAD.check_status = 'checked' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS control_checked FROM tbl_control TC INNER JOIN tbl_page TP ON TC.page_id = TP.page_id LEFT JOIN tbl_authority_detail TAD ON TC.control_id = TAD.control_id AND TAD.level_id = 3 AND TAD.authority_code = #{ahrcode,jdbcType = VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1 AND TP.page_id = #{pageid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
